post.author: 이진경
post.content:
CA-ON-Toronto/GTA-Sr. Analyst/Programmer (AS400)


----------------------------------------------------------------------

  Mandatory Skills:

Experienced AS400 Developers and Analyst/Programmers with at least 5-7 yrs of RPG programming skills required to develop solutions in a customer environment. Must have excellent written and spoken English skills. Must have a strong desire to work as part of an energetic team to create quality solutions under tight deadlines.

Specific skills required:

* Full cycle application development experience
* Advanced RPG IV, RPG II, DDS, CL, OCL, PC (Client Access/400) programming languages
* Familiarity with Integrated Language Environment (ILE)
* Ability to develop quality interactive and batch programs
* Familiar with AS/400 programming utilities and general system concepts
* Knowledge of System/36 environment an asset
* Excellent problem solving skills
* Ability to work independently in an unstructured environment
* Clear English written and verbal communication skills in customer, peer, and management environments
* Broad knowledge of development tools such as SDA, SEU, PDM, Query, DBU
* Knowledge of Windows NT operating environment

Allied International Credit Corp. is a leading international Debt Collection and Accounts Receivable Management Company. We were recognized as one of Canada's 50 Best Managed Private Companies in 1999, 2000, and 2001. We seek career-minded, entrepreneurial-spirited individuals to join our dynamic growing company.

If you are interested in this opportunity, please forward your resume to hr@aiccorp.com. Quote COMPETITION SA/P 201 when applying for this position.

Please visit our web site at (www.aiccorp.com)



----------------------------------------------------------------------Additional Information
Position Type: Full Time, Employee  

----------------------------------------------------------------------
Contact Information
hr@aiccorp.com
Allied International Credit Corp.
post.title: Analyst/Programmer (AS400)
